name: A Story From The Sky (Phone Test)
name_original: A Story From The Sky (Phone Test)
description:
This is a short demo of A Story From The Sky to show the games mechanics.

[Plays best if you enable screen rotation and click fullscreen]

Use the onscreen buttons to control the game.
Tap the dialogue boxes to close.

THIS IS THE PHONE VERSION OF THE GAME
